mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payrollhistory(emp_id, paymdate) SELECT emp_id, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM emp_table WHERE emp_table.res_yn = 'n'
mapper.select: SELECT paymdate from payrollhistory WHERE emp_id = 'SJ-0059' order by paymdate desc

select emp_table.emp_id, emp_table.salary, emp_table.emp_name, pstn_code.job_name, hdqrt_code.hq_name, dep_code.dep_name from emp_table left outer join hdqrt_code on emp_table.hq_code = hdqrt_code.hq_code left outer join dep_code on emp_table.dep_no= dep_code.dep_no left outer join pstn_code on emp_table.job_code= pstn_code.job_code
where emp_id = #{empId};
